column4: Hi, I can't Request Free CDs from shipit anymore, but I really need one this time because my laptop wont read the ones I burn for some weird reason !
if you have a flash drive, you can create a bootable usb
I dont really have one right now :/ but i will purchase one soon, there is not any other solution ?
or you can try to burn the disk from your friend's pc, for myself i'd always use a flash drive since it's pretty easy to create
hmmm thanks man but what could be the reason ??? it used to read them before I even tried using different brands of CD-Rs
i have really no idea, it could be your cd-rom's problem, or the disk's problem
personally i haven't burn and cd/dvd in a long time...
it could take a long time for the shipment
any guide on how to install using flash driver ( I know how boot from it in BIOS )
check out the program called unetbootin
it could run on both win and linux
but first of all you need to make sure your laptop support boot from usb device
it does, I saw it once 'Boot from USB flash memory'
you can use the one you got
